data.text: @VickiMcKenna @MacIverWisc This slick Vicki McKenna  is a right wing republican from the rausch Limbaugh racist radio station who brings that hateful junk to twitter. She was one of racist scott walkers largest followers during the abuse of the Lincoln Hills School Children in 2011. She wants to be noticed
@Tamaradoherty4 @VickiMcKenna @MacIverWisc Because Vicki is a horrible person.
@VickiMcKenna @MacIverWisc She can join the Boy Scouts.

@VickiMcKenna @MacIverWisc It is truly nonsensical. Pitting families against one another & children against one another as well. So many little girls watched their older siblings attend Girl Scout camp. The idea that those w/o an experimental medical procedure are banned from attending is unconscionable.

@VickiMcKenna @MacIverWisc Why are you telling people that this vaccine is no good? People are scared of it because of misinformation that is spread from people like you. Very few people have side effects, just like any other drug or vaccine. Let them make an informed decision and not scare them to death
@VickiMcKenna @MacIverWisc No shortage of fear in the world real or imagined by bureaucrats
